snippet: Oscar Pistorius has been selected for South Africa’s track team for the London Games and will run in the individual 400 meters. He will be the first amputee to compete in Olympic track events.
abstract: Oscar Pistorius, the double-amputee runner who has forced sports officials and fans to reconsider the distinction between disabled and able-bodied athletes, is named to South Africa’s Olympic track team for the 2012 London Games; he will become the first amputee to compete in Olympic track events.
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius has been selected for South Africa’s track team for the London Games and will run in the individual 400 meters. He will be the first amputee to compete in Olympic track events.

headline.seo: Pistorius Will Be on South Africa’s Olympic Team
headline.main: In First for Olympics, Amputee Will Run
headline.print_headline: In First for Olympics, Amputee Will Run
